bike.description: Hi-Ten 16.5" frame, formed DT/TT, tig welded, externally relieved head tube, threaded Euro BB, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle

components.description: Hi-Ten, 1 1/8" threadless, 1.2mm 1 1/4" blades, 6mm dropouts for 14mm axle
Hi-Ten 2pc, 165mm rise, 560mm wide, 10 degree back, 5 degree up sweep
Tektro FX330, linear spring, 15mm offset arms w/ grey soft compound pads
Tektro SBL-89, two finger, 16mm cable pull
Euro steel cups, loose ball w/ 19mm heat treated Cro-Mo 8 spline spindle
SUN ZX-25, single wall (ground side wall rear only)
Specialized Fuse, 36h, solid 14mm axle, sealed mech.
Specialized Fuse, alloy Flip-side M-30, 36h w/ 14mm axle, sealed mech.
Owners manual, chainguard, reflectors, 2x steel axle pegs w/ anti-spin hardware
